name: Final Winter
description:
What do you do when the Hero is Dead?

Final Winter is a Speedrunning RPG where the everyday common folk of a wretched little hamlet must confront a curse that, if not stopped, will kill within 10 minutes.

Anyone can be chosen at any time.

Battle abominable horrors of the cave, loot precious lifesaving gear, and decide who will make the charge, and who will pave the way with their lives. The clock is ticking. Break the curse and save the village, lest this be your Final Winter!
